newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: MAURITIUS BOURSE INDEX FALLS ON THIN VOLUME.
newsitem.headline: MAURITIUS BOURSE INDEX FALLS ON THIN VOLUME.

text.p: The Stock Exchange of Mauritius index, Semdex, ended marginally lower in thin volume on Monday, brokers said.
Brokers said Semdex eased 0.51 points to 363.34 with turnover down to 1.64 million rupees on 149,902 shares, from 8.57 million rupees on 279,766 shares.
Mauritius Commercial Bank (MCB) lost 50 cents to 86.00 rupees on 2,212 shares and State Bank of Mauritius (SBM) remained unchanged at 12.00 rupees on 43,400 shares.
Commerce based Ireland Blyth Ltd (IBL) fell 50 cents to 15.00 rupees on 2,083 shares and Rogers climbed 1.00 rupee to 91.50 rupees on 1,382 shares.
New Mauritius Hotels (NMH) was stable at 36.80 rupees on 596 shares. Grand Baie Hotel (GBH) was unchanged to 50.00 rupees and Sun Resorts lost 50 cents to 44.50 rupees, both shares were not quoted.

Investment stock Policy eased 5 cents to 3.95 rupees on 78,965 shares, Fincorp rose 1.00 rupee to 60.50 rupees on 975 shares and Promotion And Development (PAD) remained to 12.80 rupees on 2,645 shares.
In the sugar sector, Mon Desert Alma (O) was 2.00 rupees lower to 68.50 rupees on 123 shares and Mon Tresor Mon Desert (MTMD) was stable at 38.00 rupees, but unquoted.
Air Mauritius gained 1.20 rupee and was also not quoted.
